channel.title: ⋅Net on Sorush Khajepor - Numerical programming and app development
channel.description: Recent content in ⋅Net on Sorush Khajepor - Numerical programming and app development

item.title: How to use Bookmark in Visual Studio
item.description: Shortcuts Show Bookmarks window: Ctrl + k, Ctrl + w Toggle bookmark of a code line: Ctrl + k, Ctrl k Skip to the next bookmark: Ctrl + k, Ctrl + n

item.title: Connect to Microsoft Access with C# .Net core
item.description: I want to connect to an MS Access database with C# in .Net core. Therefore, I will be able to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) records.

item.title: Lockout user after multiple failed authentication via .Net core Identity
item.description: Goal I want to configure .Net core Identity in a way that when a user inserts wrong passwords several times the account gets locked for 5 minutes.

item.title: Add Identity pages to .Net core web app
item.description: By default, the identity pages are pre-compiled in .Net core 3.1 and not available to be modified. I want to bring them back so they can be edited.

item.title: Tutorial: Setup of Entity Framework (EF) core for CRUD and authentication with Razor pages
item.description: Goal In this post, step by step I create a web app using Entity Framework core and razor pages. The app is a library that admin can CRUD books info on a database and authenticated users can browse the records.

item.title: How to create a simple component, using Blazor, HTML, and CSS: Word Block
item.description: Using .Net Blazor, I want to create a simple word-block which is a rectangle that contains a word with an X button at its right side. Clicking on X the word-block disappears.
